content.question: Which of the following is the most likely outcome of a citywide sustainable design initiative?

choices.label: An increase in mixed land-use development, which improves the walkability of neighborhoods
A rapid period of gentrification resulting in more affordable housing options throughout the city
The growth of edge cities, which stimulates regional economic development
A sharp increase in the cityâ€™s population as suburban residents are drawn back to the city center
The decline of industry within the city as factories move to locations with lower labor costs

content.answer: An increase in mixed land-use development, which improves the walkability of neighborhoods

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain a likely outcome in a geographic scenario using geographic concepts, processes, models, or theories.
